author: markt
msg: Additional permission needed to read JDK logging config.

author: olegk
msg: HTTPCLIENT-652: Added optional state attribute to managed client connections

author: shv
msg: HADOOP-3069. Primary name-node should not truncate image when transfering it from the secondary. Contributed by Konstantin Shvachko.

author: dkulp
msg: Add a new "FastInfoset" feature that will turn on fastinfoset negotiation and usage for more efficient on the wire transmissions.
(tested interop with the JAX-WS RI to make sure it works)
Reduce use of spring constructor-arg elements in favor of properties.
This speeds up startup, but perhaps not as much as I had expected.
[CXF-1012] Exception handling for jaxrs (patch from Sergey applied, with modifications to get tests running)
Fix a bunch of svn properties that were found from the 2.0.5 vote
Fix some empty dirs  being left in /tmp
Fix some issues where the specified service beans were not being used after a sub resource was hit
updated poms to only load xmlbeans 2.3.0
[CXF-1494] Support Spring aop beans in jax-rs.  Patch from Sergey B. applied.
Add mutant version of wsdl_first that uses the official ant task.
Make the SoapActionInInterceptor a bit more defensive
[CXF-1464] The full set of fixes that were needed for the 2.0.x branch
Merge fixes to osgi bundle from 2.0.x branch
If specific schemas are specified, make sure we use them (and don't cache them) instead of the jaxb created schemas
Create mechanism for controlling logging in the tools.
Turn down the logging level on all the command-line mains.
Tune the logging levels more carefully.
We were spitting all sorts of INFO at users, but our own unit tests were
set to WARNING, and didn't work when some INFO appeared.
Remove this.  It helped a little on IBM jdk on Linux, but made AIX even worse.  Need to investigate the real problem more.

author: gates
msg: Removed unnecessary import statement that caused builds to not work on 1.5 JVM.
